name: Sunny (LeafletGames)
description:
Sunny is a very short but sweet visual novel about love between two women (about 450 words). There are a few choices and three ways to end.

Themes: college/university, women loving women, communication, asexuality

Suitable for all ages (some mild suggestive language)

There is a second version of the game that contains nudity and extends this version with an extra scene. You can find this version here:
